EmailTemplate.name: RE: Contracting with the Army (1361202666.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Contracting with the Army (1361202666.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi John, Understood. To my knowledge MBO has never contracted direct to the DOD but that should not pose an issue. We have worked direct with other government agencies and you can find our GSA details here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_GSA_Price_List.pdf>. We can clearances as well; you can find details about that here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf> When and if it becomes appropriate please introduce me to your contact at DOD and I will work with them to get all the paperwork in place. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Take care,Sara__________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John Weaver [mailto:john.Weaver@yahoo.com] Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2013 7:42 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Brendan Dillon Subject: Re: Contracting with the Army Sara, I am pretty read in on MBO, if my client elects to go further I will probably need to get in more detail. My question right now is MBO contracting with DOD. My immediate question is regarding MBO experience contrating directly with a DOD agency and if there are any unique requirements/issues. Thanks, JohnJohn Weaver48121 Liberty DriveShelby Township, MI 48315586-883-5666john.weaver@yahoo.com <mailto:john.weaver@yahoo.com> From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Friday, February 15, 2013 5:50 PM To: Brendan Dillon <bdillon@mbopartners.com <mailto:bdillon@mbopartners.com>>, John Weaver <john.weaver@yahoo.com <mailto:john.weaver@yahoo.com>> Subject: RE: Contracting with the Army Hi John, It’s nice to meet you via email. As Brendan metions below, I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e:sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w:www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! I have copied Sara Conde, who is a specialist in helping independent contractors get set up with their clients at MBO Partners. I have given her a little bit of a background on you and she is looking forward to getting this contract squared away. Please feel free to contact her directly. From: John Weaver [mailto:john.weaver@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:john.weaver@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Wednesday, February 13, 2013 2:24 PM To: Brendan Dillon Subject: Contracting with the Army Brendan, It has been a long time but I am back! The Army (TACOMLCMC in Warren, MI) has some interest in bringing me on as an Independent contractor due to the competitive nature of the work I am, and they want me, to do. Most companies that are under contract at TACOM would be in an Organizational Conflict of Interest with the work I am doing and they want me to continue to do it and expand the work. Understanding the complexity of contracting with the government I am interested if this is something MBO routinely does and what the nuances are in dong it. Let me know when it would be convenient to speak with you on this subject. Thanks, John John D. Weaver586-883-5666John.weaver@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:John.weaver@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVVQuUt55dyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
